Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The present study aimed to explore the effect of MT induction on carmustine ( BCNU ) - induced hippocampal cognitive dysfunction in rats .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| hippocampal cognitive dysfunction |

The disease entity in the paragraph is "hippocampal cognitive dysfunction". It is a condition that affects the hippocampus region of the brain and impairs cognitive function. The context of the paragraph suggests that this condition is induced by the drug carmustine (BCNU) in rats.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| hippocampal cognitive dysfunction |

The only disease entity in the paragraph is "hippocampal cognitive dysfunction". The other term "BCNU" is a chemotherapy drug and not a disease. Therefore, it should not be included in the list of disease entities.
